page.title: 01OUR D-BLOCK
page.content:
Our D-block is situated in the heart of rural Devon which is demonstrated by the fact that{farming}is the only industry in the area.
Amenities are virtually non-existent and all people who live in the D-block have to travel to the nearest towns to supply their daily needs.
In our study of our D-block, we have looked at the ways of life of various people - a schoolgirl, a farmer and a village. We have also looked at how we live, looking at clothes, food and homes.To finish our study, we looked at farms, collecting information from questionnaires that the children compiled.
